name: pqa-triggered enterprise outbound
hypothesis: accounts crossing first_ai_resolved_ticket threshold will convert to pilot at higher rates with 24-hour outbound follow-up

name: security-first sequence for enterprise
hypothesis: leading with trust package and DPA language in first call reduces security review delay

name: pilot success scorecard enforced
hypothesis: enforcing shared pilot success criteria within week 1 improves pilot-to-production conversion

name: agent champion enablement sprint
hypothesis: a structured champion enablement sprint reduces time-to-first-value after onboarding

name: expansion trigger by weekly ai resolution share
hypothesis: crossing 35 percent AI-assisted resolution share should trigger expansion play with higher win rate

name: strict hallucination gate in pilot
hypothesis: blocking rollout unless hallucination audits are below threshold reduces churn risk

name: segment-specific ROI calculator
hypothesis: customized ROI model by ticket volume increases close rate in finance-involved deals

name: guided implementation blueprint
hypothesis: a standardized implementation blueprint shortens time from signature to first_ai_resolved_ticket
